metadata.title: CVE-2024-42255 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tpm: Use auth only after NULL check in tpm_buf_check_hmac_response()Dereference auth after NULL check in tpm_buf_check_hmac_response().Otherwise, unless tpm2_sessions_init() was called, a call can cause NULLdereference, when TCG_TPM2_HMAC is enabled.[jarkko: adjusted the commit message.]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
